data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Popovici, Ovidiu Alin, Masner, Lubomír, Viciriuc, Mădălina, Pintilioaie, Alexandru, Notton, David G., Talamas, Elijah (2018): New distribution data for some charismatic tramp species of Platygastroidea (Hymenoptera). Zootaxa 4370 (1): 1-22, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4370.1.1|55 occurrences
